result.reason: Automatic Sort already exists as a container setting with inheritable `InheritAutoSort` behavior, persistence support, and test coverage, so this issue duplicates existing functionality.
result.approach: Close as duplicate/already implemented and reference the existing AutoSort + inheritance behavior.
